mapper.select: SELECT d.*, u.username, u.role AS user_role, c.title AS course_name FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN course c ON d.course_id = c.id WHERE d.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
SELECT d.*, u.username, u.role AS user_role, c.title AS course_name FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN course c ON d.course_id = c.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discussion (course_id, user_id, title, content, reply_count, create_time) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE discussion SET reply_count = reply_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE discussion SET reply_count = reply_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND reply_count > 0
